Text:
PonyGirl,

Are you going to be regularly posting the Fansadox collection from now on?

The current poster is very irregular in his releases and the previous one (merzedes) has moved on to other things and won't be coming back to this.

I'm asking this because I want to know which poster to DL from.

Thanks for posting #283 and #284.
no i gonna post them soon as i get them
